page.title: 17Types of Housing in Ilford.
page.content:
We have looked at{housing}in the Seven Kings area for things which tell the age of houses, like a footscraper on houses built in the 19th century. We found that a lot of houses did not have footscrapers so their ages are unknown, but the houses to the left of Meads Lane seemed older than those on the right. We guessed that the older ones were built before 19OO. All{houses}were teraced but the end of terrace house usually had a garage behind it. Also most end of terrace houses had large{back gardens. Most houses are privately owned; some of the larger houses have been converted into{self contained flats.
David, Richard, Kevin and ???. Chadwell Heath High School.
